Statement on Public Television Act of 1967 (S. 1160, H. R. 6736)
The following is a draft of the statement about which we talked by phone today:
The companion measures supporting public broadcasting, now
pending in the United States Senate and the House of Representatives
(S, 1160 and R hU 6736) clearly indicate the substantial national
